frontMatter.title: StoryPath
frontMatter.subtitle: A Location-Based Platform for Interactive Tours & Treasure Hunts
frontMatter.description: StoryPath is a cross-platform experience builder for creating location-based virtual museum exhibits, clue-driven treasure hunts, and interactive tours. Built with React, React Native, and Expo.
frontMatter.keywords: StoryPath, location-based experiences, virtual exhibits, interactive tours, treasure hunt app, React, React Native, Expo, Tailwind CSS, ChatGPT API, geolocation app, QR code scavenger hunt
